REQUESTHEADERTOUSERPROPERTYACTION_NAME_L: copy a request header to user property
REQUESTHEADERTOUSERPROPERTYACTION_DESCRI: Copies request header to a user property
REQUESTPARAMETERTOUSERPROPERTYACTION_NAM: copy a request parameter to user property
REQUESTPARAMETERTOUSERPROPERTYACTION_DES: Copies request parameter to a user property
SETREMOTEHOSTINFOACTION_DESCRIPTION_LABE: Copies the client's host name or ip address into the session
REQUESTHEADERNAME_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_: The name of the request header to read
USERPROPERTYNAME_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_L: The name of the user property to write to
SESSIONPROPERTYNAME_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTIO: The name of the session property to write to
STOREASLIST_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: If true, the values will be stored in a list
REQUESTPARAMETERNAME_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTI: The name of the request parameter to read
